name: Hairy Jack

attributes.attribute: haunted wild places in the region
turned himself into a little lame man in order to pass unnoticed among the neighbors

sources: Monaghan, Patricia. The Encyclopedia of Celtic Mythology and Folklore. Checkmark Books, 2008.
text: British folkloric spirit, named Hairy Jack, was known as a Black Dog from the Lincolnshire region. He was notorious for haunting wild places in the area and had an ability to transform himself into a little lame man to secretly intrude among the nearby residents.
